criterion: Provides accurate information about the types of hydatidiform moles and their characteristics.
Fails to mention the importance of Î²-hCG levels in diagnosing and monitoring molar pregnancies.
Does not clarify the differences between complete and partial hydatidiform moles.
Uses natural language and correct interpretation in its responses.
Does not provide guidance on the recommended first-line chemotherapy regimen for persistent GTN.
Provides accurate information about the characteristics of persistent GTN and its management.
Does not consider alternative treatments or management options for persistent GTN.
Correctly recommends further workup (imaging, additional labs) to confirm persistent GTN.
Fails to provide information about the importance of follow-up care after molar pregnancy treatment.
Provides accurate information about the risk scoring for persistent GTN.
Does not clarify the role of methotrexate and actinomycin-D in the management of persistent GTN.
